body.name: VITADE Webcam 1080P 60fps with Microphone for Streaming, 682H Pro HD USB Computer Web Camera Video Cam for Gaming Conferencing Mac Windows Desktop PC Laptop Xbox Skype OBS Twitch YouTube Xsplit
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 56 mins
features: 【Webcam 1080P 60fps】682H webcam with 100° ultra wide angle lens captures high definition image and video at 1080p/60fps.

【Stereo Microphone】Built-in dual omni-directional mics with noise cancellation effectively reduces distracting background noise for natural and clear sound. Independent sound chamber optimizes for pristine, studio-quality sound. Great for webinars, and video conferencing, distant learning and lecturing.

【Light Correction & Manual Focus】Automatic low-light correction provide true-to-life video even in dim lighting conditions. Web camera with adjustable manual focus allows you to find the fit angle in your live streaming or video conferencing. Make sure you look your best during video calls and live streaming.

【Innovative Design】Unlike most webcam clips only rotating 90°, 682H webcam plate can rotates 360° freely. You can adjust the viewing angles as you like. Tripod-ready universal clip fits all computers, laptops, Mac, LCD or monitors. (No tripod included)

【Plug & Play】Quick and easy setup. No drivers needed. Compatible with Windows 7 8 10, Mac OS 10.6 and above. Supports Chrome OS, Android 5.0 or higher. Works with social media and gaming.If you have any problem , please feel free to contact our customer service, they will provide you with professional and timely help, which can solve most of the flicker problems caused by the voltage frequency.
body.description: Vitade 682H Webcam The Vitade 682H focusing on what matters most to game streamers and YouTube vloggers – good image quality. You don’t need to spend a ton of time configuring the stream – just plug in the Vitade webcam and get to work. The wideband mic delivers crystal clear audio, and making it a great choice for business conferencing and presentations. With full HD 1080P webcam, now call, stream, blog and record like a pro in crystal clear video. Built-in dual omni-directional mics with noise cancellation effectively reduces distracting background noise for natural and clear sound. Quick and easy setup in 1 minute. No drivers needed. Compatible with Windows 7 8 10, Mac OS 10.6 and above. If you are unstable to access Windows 10's preinstalled Skype, please go to the Skype official website to download the desktop version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2019
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this because I started participating in a YouTube Livestream and wanted a decent setup. I got this in and I was surprised. Setup was easy and the video quality was great. It also had a screw in socket for a tripod attachment if you are wanting to tripod it instead of putting it on your computer screen.So far, the webcam hasn't disappointed me. It was easy to set up and it performs well. Construction quality is good for the price, and it's so small as to be easily mounted in a variety of settings. If you are a gamer or web room chatter or a vlogger I would personally recommend this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars When You Go for a Cheapy Webcam...
reviews.reviewText: Here's what you need to know when you want to buy a cheapy webcam and my thoughts on this Vitade 682H Pro HD - what a name. I have tried a couple of these lower-end, bargain bin webcams and they seem to share the same trait: they do deliver on the resolution and frame rate promised but there is always a caveat. If they have an auto-focus lens, you better have your lighting at studio quality like you are shooting a soap opera or it will focus in and out every 2 seconds. If they have manual focus, you won't have that problem but the auto-white balance may be whacked like this webcam. Too much light and the footage starts flashing and flickering all over the place like you are watching a found footage horror movie. I was wearing my wedding ring while recording some tabletop gameplay and the reflection from the ring caused the feed to start flashing as if it was having a seizure so I had to remove my ring. At least with this weird white-balance problem, you can always reduce something that you have in excess. The other problem with auto-focus? Good luck with that unless you are friends with Michael Bay. So this cam falls into the better cheapy webcam category. It's not going to replace a high end Logitech, but it's usable and serves its purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good webcam, very wide FOV
reviews.reviewText: Everything's working well out of the box so far—no driver installation needed. Same specs as the Logitech C920: 1080p, 60fps, but $30 cheaper.Good for zoom calls, streaming, or even motion capture; but just be aware that the field of view is reeeally wide. It completely captures the back wall of my bedroom, including the door on the side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2020
reviews.reviewText: this webcam is more around 45 fps, but the quality is wonderful, and it has great color correction. it was worth every penny in my opinion, i even bought one for my boyfriend :) some notes is that it does not have autofocus (there is an adjustable focus ring) and it is very wide angle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This camera did not come with a microphone
reviews.reviewText: I liked that the picture quality, with the 60 fps, significantly improved. The focus had to be manually adjusted first, however... Lack of microphone surprised me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice little webcam for someone working from home. I teach online fitness classes and this camera is much wider than the last one I was using, so be aware that it will distort at the edges but you'll have a larger area to move around in. My arms look quite long but my class participants can see the moves very well. I'm very happy with this purchase and I wish this was the camera I bought at the beginning of the pandemic!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Awful quality of picture: Not usable for video training recordings or for Zoom meetings
reviews.reviewText: BUYER BEWARE: I bought this camera as an external camera for my computer when my internal web cam went down. It hyped a great image, but after recording multiple videos with it in moderate lighting and then again with studio LED lights - the quality of the finished product was awful either way. How awful? It was embarrassing to share with others. It made me look unprofessional. Grainy, pixalated, like you tried to record with an old VHS camera in dim light. I had to re-record all the videos afterwards, wasting a lot of time and resources.Furthermore, the camera kept disconnecting while in use during Zoom meetings. It would just turn off on its own. I'd have to re-plug the camera into the USB to get it to work again, for a bit, until it turned off again - once again making me look unprofessional during meetings. I plugged other tech into the same USB port with no issues - only the camera keeps disconnecting.So I can't use it for my training videos and I cant even use it for a meeting - its just an overpriced paperweight. One of my worst purchases to date. Look elsewhere!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Recomendado. Pero enfoque automatico malo.
The camera is a big W I thought it would be a big L
reviews.reviewText: The only thing I dislike about the camera is wen I hook it up to my stream labs the camera flickers a lot then I gotta to plug it out to stop the flicker it’s weird. But other than that the webcam is really good quality for the price in my opinion and runs smooth shows really good👍

Have had it for a fair amount of time and so far its held up super well, quality is good, I dont use the mic on it though (havnt tried it) cause I have my own Mic setup but it works great for what I need it to do! Well worth the cost compared to other stuff

reviews.reviewTitle: Clear picture. but sound is too low at 32 inches.
reviews.reviewText: Manual focus which is fine.Set it once and forget it in an office environment.Despite reviews saying that sound is great, I found it way too low.Mounted atop a 35 ultrawide, it barely pics up my voice from 32 inches.Would be great sound at a closer distance.

for starters, it is a bit pricey, but from my experience, the price is 100% worth it. This is the best quality webcam ive ever seen. Got it for my online classes, and i have the best webcam in my class haha! honestly amazing quality, would recommend 10/10.
Son very happy with it, camera is steady and no lags which was important to him
